name: Drone Manufacturers Alliance Europe
goal: Drone Manufacturers Alliance Europe (DMAE) is an industry coalition of leading global drone manufacturers. Members include: Delair, DJI, Parrot and Sensefly (Parrot Group). To realise the economic potential of drones in Europe, DMAE is working towards an harmonised set of rules that facilitates the safe and secure uptake of drone operations. Committed to safety and security, DMAE cooperates with regulators and decision-makers to contribute to the policy debate and share our expertise. The secretariat of DMAE is run by GPLUS Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
Implementation of the EASA Basic Regulation
Secondary legislation (Delegated/Implementing Acts)
EASA Standard Scenarios
European Commission's U-Space initiative
